paleberry.name: Paleberry
paleberry.description:
Slot: Hands
Consumable

Can be eaten to restore one health segment.

bacon-agaric.name: Bacon Agaric
bacon-agaric.description:
Slot: Hands
Consumable

Can be eaten to restore two health segments.

beryl-nut.name: Beryl Nut
beryl-nut.description:
Slot: Hands
Consumable

Can be eaten to restore half a health segment.

medicinal-inhaler.name: Medicinal Inhaler
medicinal-inhaler.description:
Fully restores health when used.

The FICSIT Medicinal Inhaler can be produced from a variety of different ingredients.

beacon.name: Beacon
beacon.description:
PENDING REMOVAL
This item will (likely) be removed in a future update.

Currently only used as an ingredient in an alternative recipe.

parachute.name: Parachute
parachute.description:
Slot: Body
Consumable

Slows down your fall when activated in mid-air.

gas-mask.name: Gas Mask
gas-mask.description:
Allows Pioneers to breathe normally while in toxic gas areas.
Consumes Gas Filters from the inventory when in use.

jetpack.name: Jetpack
jetpack.description:
The Jetpack allows Pioneers to travel through the air with increased control.
Consumes Fuel when used and automatically refills the Fuel from the inventory, when on the ground.

chainsaw.name: Chainsaw
chainsaw.description:
Slot: Hands
Fuel: Biofuel

Used to clear an area of flora that is too difficult to remove by hand.

factory-cart.name: Factory Cart™
factory-cart.description:
The one and only FICSIT Factory Cart™
Now with special - FICSIT Foundation only - Grip Wheels, for an even smoother and faster factory floor experience!

hazmat-suit.name: Hazmat Suit
hazmat-suit.description:
Shields Pioneers from the adverse effects of radiation. 
Consumes Iodine Infused Filters from the inventory while worn in radioactive areas.

blade-runners.name: Blade Runners
blade-runners.description:
An exoskeleton for the lower legs that assists movement, allowing Pioneers to sprint faster and jump higher.
Also dampens the impact of landing.

rebar-gun.name: Rebar Gun
rebar-gun.description: Improvised ranged weapon for self-defense. Has to be reloaded after each use.

rifle.name: Rifle
rifle.description: A long-range, rapid fire weapon. Specifically designed to deliver adequate performance within the designated work area.

xeno-zapper.name: Xeno-Zapper
xeno-zapper.description: Standard issue electroshock self-defense weapon for melee range.

xeno-basher.name: Xeno-Basher
xeno-basher.description: Heavy electroshock self-defense weapon for melee range.

nobelisk-detonator.name: Nobelisk Detonator
nobelisk-detonator.description: A remote-control device used to handle and detonate Nobelisks.

portable-miner.name: Portable Miner
portable-miner.description: Can be set up on a resource node to automatically extract the resource. Note that it has limited storage space.

object-scanner.name: Object Scanner
object-scanner.description:
Slot: Hands

Scans the area for a set item. Beeps at a rate proportional to proximity and direction.

hover-pack.name: Hover Pack
hover-pack.description:
Power consumption: 100 MW

Allows for vertical movement and hovering in mid-air to improve building efficiency and factory traversal. Wirelessly connects to nearby power connections, such as Power Poles and Buildings, for power consumption.

zipline.name: Zipline
zipline.description:
Slot: Hand

Provides faster traversal in factories by allowing Pioneers to zip along Power lines.
Activate the Zipline and aim at a nearby Power Line to connect to it.

golden-factory-cart.name: Golden Factory Cart™
golden-factory-cart.description:
The one and only Golden FICSIT Factory Cart™

You have now officially ascended. 
Go forth now, Master of Spaghetti, God of the Factory, Sinker of Cups, Employee of the Planet... travel in STYLE!

uranium-waste.name: Uranium Waste
uranium-waste.description:
The by-product of consuming Uranium Fuel Rods in the Nuclear Power Plant.
Non-fissible Uranium can be extracted. Handle with caution.

Caution: HIGHLY Radioactive.

plutonium-waste.name: Plutonium Waste
plutonium-waste.description:
The by-product of consuming Plutonium Fuel Rods in the Nuclear Power Plant.
Needs to be stored in a safe location. Handle with caution.

Caution: EXTREMELY Radioactive.

gas-filter.name: Gas Filter
gas-filter.description: Used in the Gas Mask to filter out toxics and pollutants from the air.

alclad-aluminum-sheet.name: Alclad Aluminum Sheet
alclad-aluminum-sheet.description: Thin, lightweight, and highly durable sheets that are mainly used for products that require high heat conduction or a high specific strength.

battery.name: Battery
battery.description: Primarily used as fuel for Drones and Vehicles.

plastic.name: Plastic
plastic.description: A versatile and easy to manufacture material that can be used for a lot of things.

wire.name: Wire
wire.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

aluminum-ingot.name: Aluminum Ingot
aluminum-ingot.description:
Aluminum Ingots are made from Aluminum Scrap, which is refined from Alumina Solution.
Used to produce specialized aluminum-based parts.

packaged-fuel.name: Packaged Fuel
packaged-fuel.description: Fuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles or the Jetpack.

non-fissile-uranium.name: Non-fissile Uranium
non-fissile-uranium.description:
The isotope Uranium-238 is non-fissile, meaning it cannot be used for nuclear fission. It can, however, be conversed into fissile Plutonium in the Particle Accelerator.

Caution: Mildly Radioactive.

plutonium-pellet.name: Plutonium Pellet
plutonium-pellet.description:
Produced in the Particle Accelerator through conversion of Non-fissile Uranium.
Used to produce Encased Plutonium Cells for Plutonium Fuel Rods.

Power Usage: 250-750 MW (500 MW average).
Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

encased-plutonium-cell.name: Encased Plutonium Cell
encased-plutonium-cell.description:
Plutonium Cells are concrete encased Plutonium Pellets.
Used to produce Plutonium Fuel Rods for Nuclear Power production.

Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

concrete.name: Concrete
concrete.description:
Used for building.
Good for stable foundations.

silica.name: Silica
silica.description: Derived from Raw Quartz. Commonly used to create glass structures, advanced refinement processes, and alternative production of electronics.

iron-plate.name: Iron Plate
iron-plate.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

steel-beam.name: Steel Beam
steel-beam.description: Steel Beams are used most often when constructing a little more advanced buildings.

iron-rod.name: Iron Rod
iron-rod.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

screw.name: Screw
screw.description:
Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

blue-power-slug.name: Blue Power Slug
blue-power-slug.description: A strange slug radiating a weak strange power.

yellow-power-slug.name: Yellow Power Slug
yellow-power-slug.description: A strange slug radiating a strange power.

purple-power-slug.name: Purple Power Slug
purple-power-slug.description: A strange slug radiating a powerful strange power.

packaged-turbofuel.name: Packaged Turbofuel
packaged-turbofuel.description: Turbofuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles.

iodine-infused-filter.name: Iodine Infused Filter
iodine-infused-filter.description: Used in the Hazmat Suit to absorb radioactive particles.

cable.name: Cable
cable.description:
Used for crafting.
Primarily used to build power lines.

power-shard.name: Power Shard
power-shard.description:
Mucus from the power slugs compressed into a solid crystal-like shard. 
It radiates a strange power.

color-cartridge.name: Color Cartridge
color-cartridge.description:
Used for applying Patterns to structures with the Customizer.

(Patterns can be purchased in the AWESOME Shop.)

hub-parts.name: HUB Parts
hub-parts.description: The parts required to build the basic structure of the HUB.

reinforced-iron-plate.name: Reinforced Iron Plate
reinforced-iron-plate.description:
Used for crafting.
A sturdier and more durable Iron Plate.

copper-ingot.name: Copper Ingot
copper-ingot.description:
Used for crafting.
Crafted into the most basic parts.

fused-modular-frame.name: Fused Modular Frame
fused-modular-frame.description: A corrosion resistant, nitride hardened, highly robust, yet lightweight modular frame.

circuit-board.name: Circuit Board
circuit-board.description: Circuit Boards are advanced electronics that are used in a plethora of different ways.

copper-sheet.name: Copper Sheet
copper-sheet.description:
Used for crafting.
Primarily used for pipelines due to its high corrosion resistance.

crystal-oscillator.name: Crystal Oscillator
crystal-oscillator.description: A crystal oscillator is an electronic oscillator circuit that uses the mechanical resonance of a vibrating crystal to create an electrical signal with a precise frequency.

smart-plating.name: Smart Plating
smart-plating.description: Project Part #1. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

versatile-framework.name: Versatile Framework
versatile-framework.description: Project Part #2. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

automated-wiring.name: Automated Wiring
automated-wiring.description: Project Part #3. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

modular-engine.name: Modular Engine
modular-engine.description: Project Part #4. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

organic-data-capsule.name: Organic Data Capsule
organic-data-capsule.description:
This data capsule translates organic chemicals into readable alien genetics information.
Used for researching alien organisms.

high-speed-connector.name: High-Speed Connector
high-speed-connector.description: The high-speed connector connects several cables and wires in a very efficient way. Uses a standard pattern so its applications are many and varied.

motor.name: Motor
motor.description: The Motor creates a mechanical force that is used to move things from machines to vehicles.

adaptive-control-unit.name: Adaptive Control Unit
adaptive-control-unit.description: Project Part #5. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

magnetic-field-generator.name: Magnetic Field Generator
magnetic-field-generator.description:
Project Part #7. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

These modular generators use superconducting magnets and vast amounts of electricity to produce an easily expandable and powerful magnetic field.

assembly-director-system.name: Assembly Director System
assembly-director-system.description:
Project Part #6. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

This extremely fast and precise computing system is specifically designed to direct the Project Assembly: Assembly Phase.

thermal-propulsion-rocket.name: Thermal Propulsion Rocket
thermal-propulsion-rocket.description:
Project Part #8. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Uses extreme heat to produce the high pressure plasma required to get Project Assembly into motion.

nuclear-pasta.name: Nuclear Pasta
nuclear-pasta.description:
Project Part #9. Ship with the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.
Power Usage: 500-1500 MW (1000 MW average).

Nuclear Pasta is extremely dense degenerate matter, formed when extreme pressure forces protons and electrons together into neutrons. It is theorized to exist naturally within the crust of neutron stars.

iron-ingot.name: Iron Ingot
iron-ingot.description:
Used for crafting.
Crafted into the most basic parts.

rotor.name: Rotor
rotor.description:
Used for crafting.
The moving parts of a motor.

rubber.name: Rubber
rubber.description: Rubber is a material that is very flexible and has a lot of friction.

encased-industrial-beam.name: Encased Industrial Beam
encased-industrial-beam.description:
Encased Industrial Beams utilizes the compressive strength of concrete and tensile strength of steel simultaneously.
Mostly used as a stable basis for constructing buildings.

steel-pipe.name: Steel Pipe
steel-pipe.description: Steel Pipes are used most often when constructing a little more advanced buildings.

fuel.name: Fuel
fuel.description: Fuel can be used to generate power or packaged to be used as fuel for Vehicles or the Jetpack.

polymer-resin.name: Polymer Resin
polymer-resin.description:
Used for crafting.
A by-product of oil refinement into fuel. Commonly used to manufacture plastics.

heavy-oil-residue.name: Heavy Oil Residue
heavy-oil-residue.description: A by-product of Plastic and Rubber production. Can be further refined into Fuel and Petroleum Coke.

petroleum-coke.name: Petroleum Coke
petroleum-coke.description:
Used for crafting.
A carbon-rich material distilled from Heavy Oil Residue. 
Used as a less efficient coal replacement or for aluminum refinement.

modular-frame.name: Modular Frame
modular-frame.description:
Used for crafting.
Multi-purpose building block.

empty-canister.name: Empty Canister
empty-canister.description: Used to package fluids for transportation.

packaged-oil.name: Packaged Oil
packaged-oil.description: Crude Oil, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles.

packaged-heavy-oil-residue.name: Packaged Heavy Oil Residue
packaged-heavy-oil-residue.description: Heavy Oil Residue, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles.

steel-ingot.name: Steel Ingot
steel-ingot.description: Steel Ingots are made from Iron Ore that's been smelted with Coal. They are made into several parts used in building construction.

alumina-solution.name: Alumina Solution
alumina-solution.description: Dissolved Alumina, extracted from Bauxite. Can be further refined into Aluminum Scrap for Aluminum Ingot production.

aluminum-scrap.name: Aluminum Scrap
aluminum-scrap.description: Aluminum Scrap is pure aluminum refined from Alumina. Can be smelted down to Aluminum Ingots for industrial usage.

sulfuric-acid.name: Sulfuric Acid
sulfuric-acid.description: A mineral acid produced by combining Sulfur and Water in a complex reaction. Primarily used in refinement processes and Battery production.

encased-uranium-cell.name: Encased Uranium Cell
encased-uranium-cell.description:
Uranium Cells are produced from Uranium Ore. 
Used to produce Uranium Fuel Rods for Nuclear Power production.

Caution: Mildly Radioactive.

cooling-system.name: Cooling System
cooling-system.description: Used to keep temperatures of advanced parts and buildings from exceeding to inefficient levels.

nitric-acid.name: Nitric Acid
nitric-acid.description: Produced by reaction of Nitrogen Gas with Water. Its high corrosiveness and oxidizing properties make it an excellent choice for refinement and fuel production processes.

aluminum-casing.name: Aluminum Casing
aluminum-casing.description: A versatile container cast from Aluminum Ingots.

computer.name: Computer
computer.description: A Computer is a complex logic machine that is used to control advanced behaviour in machines.

quartz-crystal.name: Quartz Crystal
quartz-crystal.description: Derived from Raw Quartz. Used in the production of advanced radar technology and high-quality display screens.

caterium-ingot.name: Caterium Ingot
caterium-ingot.description: Caterium Ingots are smelted from Caterium Ore. Caterium Ingots are mostly used for advanced electronics.

stator.name: Stator
stator.description:
Used for crafting.
The static parts of a motor.

ai-limiter.name: AI Limiter
ai-limiter.description: AI Limiters are super advanced electronics that are used to control AIs and keep them from evolving in malicious ways.

quickwire.name: Quickwire
quickwire.description: Caterium's high conductivity and resistance to corrosion makes it ideal for small, advanced electronics.

compacted-coal.name: Compacted Coal
compacted-coal.description: A much more efficient alternative for Coal. Used as fuel for vehicles & coal generators.

turbofuel.name: Turbofuel
turbofuel.description: A more efficient alternative to Fuel. Can be used to generate power or packaged to be used as fuel for Vehicles.

supercomputer.name: Supercomputer
supercomputer.description: The supercomputer is the next-gen version of the computer.

empty-fluid-tank.name: Empty Fluid Tank
empty-fluid-tank.description: Used to package gases and volatile liquids for transportation.

electromagnetic-control-rod.name: Electromagnetic Control Rod
electromagnetic-control-rod.description: Control Rods regulate power output via electromagnetism.

pressure-conversion-cube.name: Pressure Conversion Cube
pressure-conversion-cube.description: Converts outgoing force into internal pressure. Required to contain unstable, high-energy matter.

turbo-motor.name: Turbo Motor
turbo-motor.description: The Turbo Motor is a more complex, and more powerful, version of the regular Motor.

copper-powder.name: Copper Powder
copper-powder.description:
Ground down Copper Ingots.
The high natural density of Copper, combined with the granularity of the powder, make this part fit for producing Nuclear Pasta in the Particle Accelerator.

black-powder.name: Black Powder
black-powder.description: An explosive powder that is commonly used to produce simple explosives.

alien-protein.name: Alien Protein
alien-protein.description:
Ground down Alien Remains in a neat little package.
Used for medical purposed and to research alien organisms.

smokeless-powder.name: Smokeless Powder
smokeless-powder.description: An explosive powder that is commonly used to produce modern firearms.

hog-remains.name: Hog Remains
hog-remains.description:
The carapace of the alien Hog creature.
Used for MAM research.

plasma-spitter-remains.name: Plasma Spitter Remains
plasma-spitter-remains.description:
The remains of a plasma spitting alien creature.
Used for MAM research.

flower-petals.name: Flower Petals
flower-petals.description:
Used for crafting.
Colorful native flower petals.

leaves.name: Leaves
leaves.description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.

mycelia.name: Mycelia
mycelia.description:
Used for crafting.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.

wood.name: Wood
wood.description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.

solid-biofuel.name: Solid Biofuel
solid-biofuel.description: The most energy-efficient form of solid biomass. Can be used as fuel for the Chainsaw.

packaged-liquid-biofuel.name: Packaged Liquid Biofuel
packaged-liquid-biofuel.description: Liquid Biofuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for Vehicles.

biomass.name: Biomass
biomass.description:
Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass burners and vehicles can use it for power.
Biomass is much more energy-efficient than raw biological matter.

liquid-biofuel.name: Liquid Biofuel
liquid-biofuel.description: Liquid Biofuel can be used to generate power or packaged to be used as fuel for Vehicles.

packaged-alumina-solution.name: Packaged Alumina Solution
packaged-alumina-solution.description: Alumina Solution, packaged for alternative transport.

packaged-sulfuric-acid.name: Packaged Sulfuric Acid
packaged-sulfuric-acid.description: Sulfuric Acid, packaged for alternative transport.

packaged-nitrogen-gas.name: Packaged Nitrogen Gas
packaged-nitrogen-gas.description: Nitrogen Gas, packaged for alternative transport.

packaged-nitric-acid.name: Packaged Nitric Acid
packaged-nitric-acid.description: Nitric Acid, packaged for alternative transport.

fabric.name: Fabric
fabric.description:
Used for equipment crafting.
Flexible but durable fabric.

hatcher-remains.name: Hatcher Remains
hatcher-remains.description:
The shell-like remains an alien... thing.
Used for MAM research.

stinger-remains.name: Stinger Remains
stinger-remains.description:
The remains of whatever that creepy thing was.
Used for MAM research.

uranium-fuel-rod.name: Uranium Fuel Rod
uranium-fuel-rod.description:
Used as fuel for the Nuclear Power Plant.

Caution: Produces radioactive Uranium Waste when consumed.
Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

plutonium-fuel-rod.name: Plutonium Fuel Rod
plutonium-fuel-rod.description:
Used as fuel for the Nuclear Power Plant.

Caution: Produces radioactive Plutonium Waste when consumed.
Caution: HIGHLY Radioactive.

sulfur.name: Sulfur
sulfur.description: Sulfur is primarily used for Black Powder.

coal.name: Coal
coal.description: Mainly used as fuel for vehicles & coal generators and for steel production.

copper-ore.name: Copper Ore
copper-ore.description:
Used for crafting.
Basic resource mainly used for electricity.

caterium-ore.name: Caterium Ore
caterium-ore.description: Caterium Ore is smelted into Caterium Ingots. Caterium Ingots are mostly used for advanced electronics.

iron-ore.name: Iron Ore
iron-ore.description:
Used for crafting.
The most essential basic resource.

raw-quartz.name: Raw Quartz
raw-quartz.description: Raw Quartz can be processed into Quartz Crystals and Silica, which both offer a variety of applications.

limestone.name: Limestone
limestone.description:
Used for crafting.
Basic resource mainly used for stable foundations.

crude-oil.name: Crude Oil
crude-oil.description: Crude Oil is refined into all kinds of Oil-based resources, like Fuel and Plastic.

bauxite.name: Bauxite
bauxite.description: Bauxite is used to produce Alumina, which can be further refined into the Aluminum Scrap required to produce Aluminum Ingots.

uranium.name: Uranium
uranium.description:
Uranium is a radioactive element. 
Used to produce Encased Uranium Cells for Uranium Fuel Rods.

Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

nitrogen-gas.name: Nitrogen Gas
nitrogen-gas.description: Nitrogen can be used in a variety of ways, such as metallurgy, cooling, and Nitric Acid production. On Massage-2(AB)b, it can be extracted from underground gas wells.

turbo-rifle-ammo.name: Turbo Rifle Ammo
turbo-rifle-ammo.description: Lightweight, compact, and volatile. These rounds provide extreme capacity and fire rates, at the cost of accuracy.

rifle-ammo.name: Rifle Ammo
rifle-ammo.description: Standard issue Rifle ammunition, useful for establishing dominance.

explosive-rebar.name: Explosive Rebar
explosive-rebar.description: Explodes on impact, dealing heavy damage.

stun-rebar.name: Stun Rebar
stun-rebar.description:
Electrocutes the target on impact, stunning it for a short time.

Stun duration: 5 seconds

iron-rebar.name: Iron Rebar
iron-rebar.description: A simple iron rebar that can be shot using the Rebar Gun, for self-defense purposes.

homing-rifle-ammo.name: Homing Rifle Ammo
homing-rifle-ammo.description:
The bullet guidance system, build into this ammunition, allows it to accurately hit any target within the reticle area.
Especially useful when dealing with agile threats, or for Pioneers who can't be bothered to aim properly.

cluster-nobelisk.name: Cluster Nobelisk
cluster-nobelisk.description: A Nobelisk that detonates into multiple smaller explosions. Practical when clearing out large areas of vegetation and other inconveniences.

nobelisk.name: Nobelisk
nobelisk.description: A simple explosive, useful for clearing boulders, vegetation, and other obstacles.

gas-nobelisk.name: Gas Nobelisk
gas-nobelisk.description: Instead of a regular explosion, this Nobelisk creates a deadly gas cloud.

nuke-nobelisk.name: Nuke Nobelisk
nuke-nobelisk.description:
This Nobelisk uses a nuclear fission reaction to generate a massive explosion.

WARNING: Ensure all FICSIT property is clear of the blast zone before detonation.

pulse-nobelisk.name: Pulse Nobelisk
pulse-nobelisk.description: Instead of a regular explosion, this Nobelisk generates a powerful shockwave.

shatter-rebar.name: Shatter Rebar
shatter-rebar.description: This rebar fractures when shot, launching deadly debris in a wide spread but with limited range.

craft-bench.name: Craft Bench
craft-bench.description:
Allows you to manually craft a large range of different parts. 
These parts can then be used in construction of different factory buildings, vehicles and equipment.

conveyor-wall-mount.name: Conveyor Wall Mount
conveyor-wall-mount.description:
Can be attached to walls and is used as a connection for conveyor belts.
Useful to route conveyor belts in a more controlled manner and over long distances.

hypertube-wall-hole.name: Hypertube Wall Hole
hypertube-wall-hole.description: Can be attached to walls to allow Hypertubes to pass through them.

hypertube-wall-support.name: Hypertube Wall Support
hypertube-wall-support.description:
Can be attached to walls. 
Supports for Hypertubes to allow for longer distances.

pipeline-wall-support.name: Pipeline Wall Support
pipeline-wall-support.description:
Can be attached to walls.
Used to connect Pipelines over longer distances.

pipeline-wall-hole.name: Pipeline Wall Hole
pipeline-wall-hole.description: Can be attached to walls, allowing Pipelines to pass through them.

conveyor-merger.name: Conveyor Merger
conveyor-merger.description: Merges up to three conveyor belts into one.

conveyor-splitter.name: Conveyor Splitter
conveyor-splitter.description:
Splits conveyor belts in three. 
Useful to move parts and resources from oversaturated conveyor belts.

power-switch.name: Power Switch
power-switch.description:
Can be switched ON/OFF to enable/disable the connection between two Power Grids.

Note the location of the A and B connection.

conveyor-belt-mk-1.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.1
conveyor-belt-mk-1.description: Transports up to 60 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

conveyor-belt-mk-5.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.5
conveyor-belt-mk-5.description: Transports up to 780 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

conveyor-belt-mk-2.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.2
conveyor-belt-mk-2.description: Transports up to 120 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

conveyor-belt-mk-3.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.3
conveyor-belt-mk-3.description: Transports up to 270 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

conveyor-belt-mk-4.name: Conveyor Belt Mk.4
conveyor-belt-mk-4.description: Transports up to 480 resources per minute. Used to move resources between buildings.

conveyor-lift-mk-1.name: Conveyor Lift Mk.1
conveyor-lift-mk-1.description: Transports up to 60 resources per minute. Used to move resources between floors.

conveyor-lift-mk-5.name: Conveyor Lift Mk.5
conveyor-lift-mk-5.description: Transports up to 780 resources per minute. Used to move resources between floors.

conveyor-lift-mk-2.name: Conveyor Lift Mk.2
conveyor-lift-mk-2.description: Transports up to 120 resources per minute. Used to move resources between floors.

conveyor-lift-mk-3.name: Conveyor Lift Mk.3
conveyor-lift-mk-3.description: Transports up to 270 resources per minute. Used to move resources between floors.

conveyor-lift-mk-4.name: Conveyor Lift Mk.4
conveyor-lift-mk-4.description: Transports up to 480 resources per minute. Used to move resources between floors.

truck-station.name: Truck Station
truck-station.description:
Either send or receive resources to vehicles. Has an inventory with 48 slots.
Transfers up to 120 stacks per minute to/from docked vehicle. 
Always refuels vehicles if it has access to a matching fuel type.

drone-port.name: Drone Port
drone-port.description:
Drone Ports can have one other Port assigned as their transport destination.
Each Drone Port can contain a single Drone, which transports available input back and forth between its home and destination Ports.

The Drone Port interface provides delivery details and allows management of Port connections.

lookout-tower.name: Lookout Tower
lookout-tower.description: Provides a good overview which makes factory construction easier.

u-jelly-landing-pad.name: U-Jelly Landing Pad
u-jelly-landing-pad.description:
Generates a speed dampening jelly.
Guarantees a safe landing.

flood-light-tower.name: Flood Light Tower
flood-light-tower.description:
A tall light tower, specifically designed for illuminating large or outdoor spaces.

Light color and intensity can be modified.
Allows up to two Power Line connections.

wall-mounted-flood-light.name: Wall Mounted Flood Light
wall-mounted-flood-light.description:
Can be attached to Walls and Foundations to illuminate large spaces.

Light color and intensity can be modified.
Allows up to two Power Line connections.

foundation-2m.name: Foundation 2m
foundation-2m.description:
Provides a flat floor to build your factory on.

Buildings on top of the foundation are adjusted to a grid, to make it easier to line them up to each other.

quarter-pipe.name: Quarter Pipe
quarter-pipe.description:
Provides an optional factory look that is smoother and offers possibilities for recreational activities. 
Still utilizes the standard foundation building grid for improved building placement.

inverted-quarter-pipe.name: Inverted Quarter Pipe
inverted-quarter-pipe.description:

Still utilizes the standard foundation building grid for improved building placement.

resource-well-pressurizer.name: Resource Well Pressurizer
resource-well-pressurizer.description:
Can be placed on a Resource Well to activate it by pressurizing the underground resource.
Once activated, Resource Well Extractors can be placed on the surrounding sub-nodes to extract the resource.
Requires Power. Overclocking increases the output potential of the entire Resource Well.

resource-well-extractor.name: Resource Well Extractor
resource-well-extractor.description:
Normal extraction rate: 60m³ fluid per minute.
Head Lift: 10 meters.
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Can be placed on the activated sub-nodes of a Resource Well to collect the pressurized resources. Does not require Power.

biomass-burner.name: Biomass Burner
biomass-burner.description:
Burns various forms of biomass to generate electricity for the power grid.
Has no input and must therefore be fed biomass manually.

Resource consumption will automatically be lowered to meet power demands.

coal-generator.name: Coal Generator
coal-generator.description:
Burns Coal to boil Water, the produced steam rotates turbines to generate electricity for the power grid.
Has a Conveyor Belt and Pipe input, so both the Coal and Water supply can be automated.

Caution: Always generates at the set clock speed. Shuts down if fuel requirements are not met.

fuel-generator.name: Fuel Generator
fuel-generator.description:
Consumes Fuel to generate electricity for the power grid.
Has a Pipe input so the Fuel supply can be automated.

Caution: Always generates at the set clock speed. Shuts down if fuel requirements are not met.

geothermal-generator.name: Geothermal Generator
geothermal-generator.description:
Has to be built on a Geyser. Generates power.

Caution: Power production fluctuates.

Power Production:
Impure 50-150 MW (100 MW average)
Normal 100-300 MW (200 MW average)
Pure 200-600 MW (400 MW average)

nuclear-power-plant.name: Nuclear Power Plant
nuclear-power-plant.description:
Consumes Nuclear Fuel Rods and Water to produce electricity for the power grid.

Produces Nuclear Waste, which is extracted from the conveyor belt output.

Caution: Always generates at the set clock speed. Shuts down if fuel requirements are not met.

jump-pad.name: Jump Pad
jump-pad.description:
Used for quick, vertical traversal.
The launch angle can be adjusted while building.
Caution: Be sure to land safely!

ladder.name: Ladder
ladder.description: A ladder with a default height of 2 meters, which can be extended while building. Snaps to walls and foundations.

ceiling-light.name: Ceiling Light
ceiling-light.description:
Can be placed on ceilings to light up indoor factory spaces.

Light color and intensity can be modified.
Allows up to two Power Line connections.

street-light.name: Street Light
street-light.description:
A small Street Light, perfect for lighting up factory pathways and roads.

Light color and intensity can be modified.
Allows up to two Power Line connections.

lights-control-panel.name: Lights Control Panel
lights-control-panel.description:
Useful for sectioning and modifying many lights at once.

Controls all Lights connected to the Power Grid attached to the 'Light Power Connector'.
(Other Control Panels and Power Switches interrupt the connection.)

mam.name: MAM
mam.description:
The Molecular Analysis Machine is used to analyse new and exotic materials found on alien planets.
R&D will assist Pioneers through the MAM to turn any valuable data into usable research options and new technologies.

constructor.name: Constructor
constructor.description:
Crafts one part into another part.

Can be automated by feeding parts into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced parts can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

smelter.name: Smelter
smelter.description:
Smelts ore into ingots.

Can be automated by feeding ore into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced ingots can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

foundry.name: Foundry
foundry.description:
Smelts two resources into alloy ingots.

Can be automated by feeding ore into it with a conveyor belt connected to the inputs. The produced ingots can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

refinery.name: Refinery
refinery.description:
Refines fluid and/or solid parts into other parts.
Head Lift: 10 meters.
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Contains both a Conveyor Belt and Pipe input and output, to allow for the automation of various recipes.

assembler.name: Assembler
assembler.description:
Crafts two parts into another part.

Can be automated by feeding parts into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced parts can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

packager.name: Packager
packager.description:
Used for the packaging and unpacking of fluids.
Head Lift: 10 meters.
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Contains both a Conveyor Belt and Pipe input and output, to allow for the automation of various recipes.

blender.name: Blender
blender.description:
The Blender is capable of blending fluids and combining them with solid parts in various processes.
Head Lift: 10 meters.
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards).

Contains both Conveyor Belt and Pipe inputs and outputs.

manufacturer.name: Manufacturer
manufacturer.description:
Crafts three or four parts into another part.

Can be automated by feeding parts into it with a conveyor belt connected to the input. The produced parts can be automatically extracted by connecting a conveyor belt to the output.

particle-accelerator.name: Particle Accelerator
particle-accelerator.description:
The FICSIT Particle Accelerator uses electromagnetic fields to propel particles to very high speeds and energies. The specific design allows for a variety of processes, such as matter generation and conversion.

Warning: Power usage is extremely high, unstable, and varies per recipe.

hypertube.name: Hypertube
hypertube.description:
Tubes for transporting FICSIT employees.
A Hypertube Entrance needs to be attached to power and enter a Hypertube system.

fluid-buffer.name: Fluid Buffer
fluid-buffer.description:
Can contain up to 400m³ of fluid.
Has an input and output for pipes.

industrial-fluid-buffer.name: Industrial Fluid Buffer
industrial-fluid-buffer.description:
Can contain up to 2400m³ of fluid.
Has an input and output for pipes.

pipeline-mk-1.name: Pipeline Mk.1
pipeline-mk-1.description:
Outside indicators show volume, flow rate and direction.
Transports up to 300m³ of fluid per minute.
Used to transport fluids.

pipeline-mk-2.name: Pipeline Mk.2
pipeline-mk-2.description:
Outside indicators show volume, flow rate and direction.
Transports up to 600m³ of fluid per minute.
Used to transport fluids.

pipeline-junction-cross.name: Pipeline Junction Cross
pipeline-junction-cross.description: Can be attached to a pipeline to split it 4-way.

valve.name: Valve
valve.description:
Used to limit Pipeline flow rates.
Can be attached to a Pipeline.

NOTE: Has an in- and output direction.

pipeline-pump-mk-1.name: Pipeline Pump Mk.1
pipeline-pump-mk-1.description:
Can be attached to a Pipeline to apply Head Lift.
Maximum Head Lift: 20 meters
(Allows fluids to be transported 20 meters upwards.)

NOTE: Has an in- and output direction.
NOTE: Head Lift does not stack, so space between Pumps is recommended.

pipeline-pump-mk-2.name: Pipeline Pump Mk.2
pipeline-pump-mk-2.description:
Can be attached to a Pipeline to apply Head Lift.
Maximum Head Lift: 50 meters
(Allows fluids to be transported 50 meters upwards.)

NOTE: Has an in- and output direction.
NOTE: Head Lift does not stack, so space between Pumps is recommended.

pipeline-support.name: Pipeline Support
pipeline-support.description:
Can be used as a connection for pipelines. The height of the support can be adjusted.
Useful to route pipelines in a more controlled manner and over long distances.

stackable-hypertube-support.name: Stackable Hypertube Support
stackable-hypertube-support.description: Support for Hypertubes. Can be stacked on other stackable supports.

hypertube-support.name: Hypertube Support
hypertube-support.description: Supports for Hypertubes to allow for longer distances.

stackable-pipeline-support.name: Stackable Pipeline
stackable-pipeline-support.description: Support for pipelines. Can be stacked on other stackable supports.

conveyor-pole.name: Conveyor Pole
conveyor-pole.description:
Can be used as a connection for conveyor belts. The height of the pole can be adjusted.
Useful to route conveyor belts in a more controlled manner and over long distances.

power-pole-mk-1.name: Power Pole Mk.1
power-pole-mk-1.description:
Can handle up to 4 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

wall-outlet-mk-1.name: Wall Outlet Mk.1
wall-outlet-mk-1.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall.

Can handle up to 4 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

power-pole-mk-2.name: Power Pole Mk.2
power-pole-mk-2.description:
Can handle up to 7 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

power-pole-mk-3.name: Power Pole Mk.3
power-pole-mk-3.description:
Can handle up to 10 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

double-wall-outlet-mk-1.name: Double Wall Outlet Mk.1
double-wall-outlet-mk-1.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall. Has one connector on each side of the wall.

Can handle up to 4 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

double-wall-outlet-mk-2.name: Double Wall Outlet Mk.2
double-wall-outlet-mk-2.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall. Has one connector on each side of the wall.

Can handle up to 7 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

wall-outlet-mk-2.name: Wall Outlet Mk.2
wall-outlet-mk-2.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall.

Can handle up to 7 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

double-wall-outlet-mk-3.name: Double Wall Outlet Mk.3
double-wall-outlet-mk-3.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall. Has one connector on each side of the wall.

Can handle up to 10 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

wall-outlet-mk-3.name: Wall Outlet Mk.3
wall-outlet-mk-3.description:
Power Pole that attaches to a wall.

Can handle up to 10 Power Line connections.

Connect Power Poles, Power Generators and factory buildings together with Power Lines to create a power grid. The power grid supplies the connected buildings with power.

power-storage.name: Power Storage
power-storage.description:
Storage Capacity: 100 MWh (100 MW for 1 hour)
Max Charge Rate: 100 MW
Max Discharge Rate: Unlimited 

Can be connected to a Power Grid to store excess power production. The stored power can be used later in cases of high consumption.

radar-tower.name: Radar Tower
radar-tower.description:
Radar Towers scan their surrounding area to display additional information on the Map.

The information revealed on the Map includes:
- Resource Node locations
- Terrain data
- Flora & fauna information
- Notable signal readings

train-station.name: Train Station
train-station.description:
Locomotives can be set to drive to and stop at the Train Station.
You can connect power to the train station to power up the trains on the railway as well as transport the power to other stations.

railway.name: Railway
railway.description:
Used to transport trains in a reliable and fast manner.
Has a wide turn angle so make sure to plan it out properly.

miner-mk-1.name: Miner Mk.1
miner-mk-1.description:
Extracts solid resources from the resource node it is built on. 
The normal extraction rate is 60 resources per minute. 
The extraction rate is modified depending on resource node purity. Outputs all extracted resources onto connected conveyor belts.

oil-extractor.name: Oil Extractor
oil-extractor.description:
Normal extraction rate: 120m³ oil per minute.
Head Lift: 10 meters.
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Can be built on an Oil Node to extract Crude Oil. Extraction rates depend on node purity.

miner-mk-2.name: Miner Mk.2
miner-mk-2.description:
Extracts solid resources from the resource node it is built on. 
The normal extraction rate is 120 resources per minute. 
The extraction rate is modified depending on resource node purity. Outputs all extracted resources onto connected conveyor belts.

miner-mk-3.name: Miner Mk.3
miner-mk-3.description:
Extracts solid resources from the resource node it is built on. 
The normal extraction rate is 240 resources per minute. 
The extraction rate is modified depending on resource node purity. Outputs all extracted resources onto connected conveyor belts.

awesome-sink.name: AWESOME Sink
awesome-sink.description:
Got excess resources? Fear not, for FICSIT does not waste! The newly developed AWESOME Sink turns any useful part straight into research data, as fast as you can supply it! 
Participating pioneers will be compensated with Coupons to be spend at the AWESOME Shop.

awesome-shop.name: AWESOME Shop
awesome-shop.description:
Redeem your FICSIT Coupons here! 
For those employees going the extra kilometer we have set aside special bonus milestones and rewards! Get your Coupons in the AWESOME Sink program now!

*No refunds possible.

space-elevator.name: Space Elevator
space-elevator.description:
Requires deliveries of special Project Parts to complete Phases of Project Assembly.
Completing Phases in the Space Elevator will unlock new Tiers in the HUB Terminal.

smart-splitter.name: Smart Splitter
smart-splitter.description:
Splits conveyor belts in three.
You can set a rule for each output to decide exactly what part should go there.

programmable-splitter.name: Programmable Splitter
programmable-splitter.description:
Splits conveyor belts in three. 
You can set rules for each output to decide exactly where each part should go.

stairs-left.name: Stairs Left
stairs-left.description:
Snaps to foundations.
Makes it easier to get to other floors of your structures.

stairs-right.name: Stairs Right
stairs-right.description:
Snaps to foundations.
Makes it easier to get to other floors of your structures.

storage-container.name: Storage Container
storage-container.description:
Contains 24 slots for storing large amounts of items.
Has an input and output for conveyor belts.

personal-storage-box.name: Personal Storage Box
personal-storage-box.description: Contains 25 slots for storing large amounts of items.

industrial-storage-container.name: Industrial Storage
industrial-storage-container.description:
Contains 48 slots for storing large amounts of items.
Has two inputs and outputs for conveyor belts.

hazard-storage-box.name: Hazard Storage Box
hazard-storage-box.description: Contains 25 slots for storing large amounts of items.

medical-storage-box.name: Medical Storage Box
medical-storage-box.description: Contains 25 slots for storing large amounts of items.

the-hub.name: The HUB
the-hub.description: The heart of your factory. This is where you complete FICSIT milestones to unlock additional blueprints of buildings, vehicles, parts, equipment etc.

freight-platform.name: Freight Platform
freight-platform.description:
Freight Cars that stop at the Freight Platform will be loaded or unloaded by the Freight Platform.
Loading and unloading options can be set inside the building.
Snaps to other Platforms and Stations.
Needs to be connected to a powered Railway to function.

fluid-freight-platform.name: Fluid Freight Platform
fluid-freight-platform.description:
Freight Cars that stop at the Freight Platform will be loaded or unloaded by the Freight Platform.
Loading and unloading options can be set inside the building.
Snaps to other Platforms and Stations.
Needs to be connected to a powered Railway to function.

empty-platform.name: Empty Platform
empty-platform.description: An empty train platform for when you need to create some empty space.

empty-platform-with-catwalk.name: Empty Platform With Catwalk
empty-platform-with-catwalk.description: An empty train platform for when you need to create some empty space.

walkway-crossing.name: Walkway Crossing
walkway-crossing.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walkways.
Specifically made for humans to walk on.

walkway-ramp.name: Walkway Ramp
walkway-ramp.description:

basic-wall-4m.description:
Snaps to foundations and other walls.
Useful for building multi-floor structures.

Size: 8m x 4m

conveyor-wall-x3.name: Conveyor Wall x3
conveyor-wall-x3.description:
Has 3 Conveyor Belt connections.
Snaps to Foundations and other Walls.

Size: 8m x 4m

conveyor-wall-x2.name: Conveyor Wall x2
conveyor-wall-x2.description:

block-signal.name: Block Signal
block-signal.description:
Train Signals are used to direct the movement of Trains to avoid collisions and bottlenecks.

Block Signals can be placed on Railways to create 'Blocks' between each other. When a Train is occupying such a Block, other Trains will be unable to enter it.

Caution: Signals are directional! Trains are unable to move against this direction, so be sure to set up Signals in both directions for bi-directional Railways.

path-signal.name: Path Signal
path-signal.description:
Train Signals are used to direct the movement of Trains to avoid collisions and bottlenecks.

Path Signals are advanced signals that are especially useful for bi-directional Railways and complex intersections. They function similarly to Block Signals but rather than occupying the entire Block, Trains can reserve a specific path through it and will only enter the Block if their path allows them to fully pass through it.

Caution: Signals are directional! Trains are unable to move against this direction, so be sure to set up Signals in both directions for bi-directional Railways.

truck.name: Truck
truck.description:
Fuel: Any fuel type

48-slot inventory. Has a built-in craft bench.
Can be automated to pick up and deliver resources at truck stations.

Nicknamed the Unit by FICSIT pioneers because of its massive frame.

drone.name: Drone
drone.description:
Has to be built on a Drone Port.

Fuel: Batteries, based on travel distance.
Refuels at any of its connected Ports, if able.

9-slot inventory.

Transports available input back and forth between its home and destination Ports. Drone Status and other details are shown on its home Drone Port.

tractor.name: Tractor
tractor.description:
Fuel: Any fuel type

25-slot inventory. Has a built-in craft bench.
Can be automated to pick up and deliver resources at truck stations.

Nicknamed the Sugarcube by FICSIT pioneers with the justification “It’s pretty sweet, y’know”.

freight-car.name: Freight Car
freight-car.description:
The Freight Car can be built on Railways and attached to an Electric Locomotive or other Freight Car to transport resources. 
Resources are loaded and unloaded at Freight Platforms.
Has a 1600m³ or 32 slot capacity, depending on the resources.

electric-locomotive.name: Electric Locomotive
electric-locomotive.description:
The Locomotive is used to move Freight Cars from station to station.
Requires between 25-110 MW of power to drive. 
Must be built on railway.

Nicknamed 'Leif' by FICSIT pioneers because of its reliability.

explorer.name: Explorer
explorer.description:
Fuel: Any fuel type

24-slot inventory. Has a built-in craft bench.

Fast and nimble exploration vehicle. Tuned for really rough terrain and able to climb almost vertical surfaces.

cyber-wagon.name: Cyber Wagon
cyber-wagon.description:
